entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is trying to get sorted into a house at Hogwarts. He is described as feeling queasy and not brave or quick-witted.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who whispers to him about trying on the hat.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is Ron's twin brother who was talking about wrestling a troll.

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: Hannah Abbott is a student who gets sorted into Hufflepuff house. She is described as having blonde pigtails and being pink-faced.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as indicated by Ron whispering to Harry.
